data.naming_authority: The German Centre for Integrative Biodiversity Research (iDiv) Halle-Jena-Leipzig
data.title: Local bird diversity (cSAR/BES-SIM)
data.summary: Changes in bird diversity at 1-degree resolution caused by land use, estimated by the cSAR model for 1900-2015 using LUH2.0 historical reconstruction of land-use.
data.source: Uses the LUH 2.0 projections for land-use, and PREDICTS based coefficients for bird affinities to land-uses. See more details in associated publication (Pereira et al. 2020, doi.org/10.1101/2020.04.14.031716).

creator.creator_institution: German Centre for Integrative Biodiversity Research (iDiv)

publisher.publisher_institution: German Centre for Integrative Biodiversity Research (iDiv)

ebv_entity.ebv_entity_scope: Birds, Forest Birds, Non forest Birds

ebv_metric_1.:standard_name: Relative change in the number of species (%)
ebv_metric_1.:long_name: Relative change in the number of species (S) using the year 1900 as reference (e.g. -50 corresponds to a decrease in 50% of the number of species in the cell since 1900, (S_year-S_1900)/S_1900*100)

ebv_metric_2.:standard_name: Absolute change in the number of species
ebv_metric_2.:long_name: Absolute change in the number of species (S) using the year 1900 as reference (e.g. -50 corresponds to a decrease in 50 of the number of species in the cell since 1900, (S_year-S_1900))
